mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CORPERATION ( CORP_NO, CORP_NAME, CORP_UPJ, CORP_UPT, CORP_ADDR, CORP_MANAGER, CORP_MANAGERTEL, CORP_TEL, CORP_REGDATE ) VALUES( CORP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{corpName}, #{corpUpj}, #{corpUpt}, #{corpAddr}, #{corpManager}, #{corpManagerTel}, #{corpTel}, #{corpRegDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.CORP_NO, c.CORP_NAME, m.CODE_NAME AS CORP_UPT, m2.CODE_NAME AS CORP_UPJ, c.CORP_ADDR, c.CORP_MANAGER, c.CORP_MANAGERTEL, c.CORP_TEL, TO_CHAR(c.CORP_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CORP_REGDATE FROM CORPERATION c LEFT JOIN MASTER_CODETBL m ON c.CORP_UPT = m.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN MASTER_CODETBL m2 ON c.CORP_UPJ = m2.CODE_ID ORDER BY c.CORP_NO ASC

SELECT c.CORP_NO, c.CORP_NAME, m.CODE_NAME AS CORP_UPT, m2.CODE_NAME AS CORP_UPJ, c.CORP_ADDR, c.CORP_MANAGER, c.CORP_MANAGERTEL, c.CORP_TEL, TO_CHAR(c.CORP_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CORP_REGDATE FROM CORPERATION c LEFT JOIN MASTER_CODETBL m ON c.CORP_UPT = m.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN MASTER_CODETBL m2 ON c.CORP_UPJ = m2.CODE_ID WHERE CORP_NO = #{corpNo}
SELECT * FROM CORPERATION ORDER BY CORP_NO ASC
